bio: I focus on medical image analysis and 3D computer vision. I have (co-)first-authored 10+ papers on top-tier journals/conferences, e.g., Cancer Research, CVPR, MICCAI, and NeurIPS. I have been a reviewer for 10+ prestigious venues, a top-ranking participant for several AI competitions, and the lead organizer for MICCAI 2020 RibFrac Challenge.
